content: back up towards the neckline 2 attach your yarn to the right corner and chain 4 skip the three dcs from the row below place 3 dcs in the next chain space and chain one skip the next three dcs from the row below and repeat this across the row you should end with 3 dcs in the corner space chain 4 and turn 3 skip the three dcs from the row below 3 double_crochet in the next chain space chain 1 repeat to end of row ending with 3 double_crochet in the final chain space turn 5 4 repeat these steps until you have reached the desired measurement or row if you are using the center seam method you will fasten_off this half and move on to working granny stripe for the next half you will now repeat all of these steps for your second panel to reach the desired measurement but do not fasten_off at the end of the second panel you will then move to the joining the halves section if you are doing the off-center seam method you will simply finish the stripe section and do not fasten_off just move to the joining the halves section joining the halves 1 you will now choose if you are going to slip_stitch seam the two halves together make sure that you have both sections inside out and that the right sides are together so that your seam will be towards the inside of the cardi you can either slip_stitch seam it or fasten_off and use your favorite seaming stitch to join both panels together when you have finished seaming it you can try it on and see how your cardigan fits if you like the fit then you can weave in your ends and be done 2 if you want to add length you can do more granny stripes along the bottom edge of your cardi you will simply turn the work to attach your yarn at one of the bottom corners and then follow the granny stripe section instructions until you have reached the length you want for your cardi at this point fasten_off weave in ends and enjoy your finished garment finishing tips 1 you may want to add a border to tidy up any unruly edges you can do a single_crochet border or any other decorative edge that you want to do around the neckline and down the front or around the bottom edge as well you could also add a button band in single crochets around the neckline the options are only limited by your creativity 6 your notes i provided this space for you to make any notes you might need for your project 7 granny hexi chart = magic_ring = 3 chain turning chain = 2 double_crochet cluster = 3 double_crochet cluster = chain 2 space = half_double_crochet
